official_title: A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide adequate case management services.
short_title: Case Management Services Improvement Act of 2007

summary.text: Case Management Services Improvement Act of 2007 - Amends provisions of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act that authorize the President to provide case management services for victims of major disasters to require private sector recipients to be nonprofit or faith-based organizations with experience in case management services. Makes this provision applicable to any major disaster declared on or after January 1, 2005.

titles.title: Case Management Services Improvement Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide adequate case management services.
